posts.content: 1970 ghia very dry but its had a knock on the nose, recent built engine new heads cylinders full flowed, cooler, fillter, told when i bought it was a 1776cc but its on a stock card, just fitted a 4inch narrowed beam droppted spindles fitted with a set of fat lips the fronts have a 1inch spacer to clear the front breaks thats the only reason i have fitted a 4inch beam new bearings all round have all the papers and duty paid. the car has had some after market trim fitted and the pice on the drivers door has half missing but if you were to fit original trim back on it would cover the holes, and missing both head light trims, inside the dash cover (wood effect ) has been removed then painted black, i will get some more better pics when i get my camera back these are what i have on my computer at the moment your more than welcome to come have a look or call me on 07917 421472 im up in lancs/north yorks looking for Â£6500
